mapper.select: SELECT account.emp_id AS emp_id, account.username AS username, pi.fname AS first_name, pi.mname AS middle_name, pi.lname AS last_name, position.position_name AS position_name, account.img_src AS img_src FROM tbl_user AS account INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info AS pi ON account.emp_id = pi.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_position_mst AS position ON account.position_id = position.position_id INNER JOIN tbl_user_project AS up ON account.emp_id = up.emp_id WHERE account.username = #{session};
